have saved them. They will appear on all

common.DisclaimerText: By proceeding, I agree that I have read and understood the Terms & Conditions of usage of 247 and consent to the same. I am voluntarily availing of the services provided on this platform. I am fully aware that I will not be undergoing a physical examination by a physician prior to a physician recommending  medical tests and/or treatment and/or the prescribing of OTC drugs. I am also aware that  the consultation on 247 Application does not preclude my rights to visit a physician and opt for a physical examination at any point in time and I am free at any time during the consultation to request for the same.
common.covidHelpText: We are here to help you.
common.covidMessageText: Apollo 247 has curated fact-based information from reputed sources on Coronavirus. Now you can get reliable answers to common questions at one place.

medicine_cart.tatUnServiceableAlertDesc:
Some items in your order are not deliverable to the selected address.

You may either change the address or delete the item from your cart.

You can also call 1860 500 0101 for Apollo Pharmacy retail customer care.
medicine_cart.pharmaAddressUnServiceableAlert:
Sorry! We’re working hard to get to this area! In the meantime, you can either pick up from a nearby store, or change the pincode.
You can also call 1860 500 0101 for Apollo Pharmacy retail customer care.
medicine_cart.pharmaAddressServiceabilityFailure: Sorry! We’re unable to check serviceability. In the meantime, you can either pick up from a nearby store, or call 1860 500 0101 for Apollo Pharmacy retail customer care.
medicine_cart.cartUpdatedAfterPriceCheckMsg: Your Cart has been updated! MRP of some items may have changed or some items may be removed due to unavailability.
medicine_cart.addItemsForStoresAlert: Please add items to your cart to view the list of stores available.
medicine_cart.storeItemsAvailabilityApiFailMsg: Sorry! We’re unable to check availability of cart items for the selected store. Please try later or opt for Home Delivery.
medicine_cart.cartItemsNotAvailableInStore: The item(s) you have selected are not available in the nearby stores. Kindly opt for Home Delivery and we will deliver them to you directly at your doorstep.

diagnostics.nonServiceableMsg: Diagnostic services are not available in {{city_name}} for now.

diagnostics.disabledDiagnosticsMsg: Sorry, we can not process {{testNames}} now. This will be removed from your cart.
diagnostics.disabledDiagnosticsFailureMsg: Sorry, we are unable to verify items in your cart right now. Please try again later.
